parlour_info.name: Beauty
parlour_info.about_us: S3 Beauty Parlour is dedicated to providing an exceptional beauty experience. Our team of certified professionals is committed to using the highest quality products and techniques to help you look and feel your best. We specialize in a wide range of services, from hair care and styling to advanced skincare and nail art.

services.name: Haircuts & Styling
services.description: Our expert stylists are trained in the latest techniques to give you the perfect look.

services.name: Facials & Skincare
services.description: Rejuvenate your skin with our range of professional facial treatments.

services.name: Nail Care (Manicure & Pedicure)
services.description: Treat your hands and feet to our luxurious manicure and pedicure services.

services.name: Bridal & Party Makeup
services.description: Flawless and stunning makeup for your special occasions.

testimonials.author: Priya Sharma
testimonials.quote: Amazing service! The staff is so friendly and professional. I love my new haircut!

testimonials.author: Rahul Singh
testimonials.quote: Excellent facial. My skin feels so refreshed. Highly recommended!

gallery_images.alt_text: A client with a new hairstyle
